CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 31, 1945, pg. 28, reads: "Announcing Our Fourth Anniversary In Pittsburgh - Left to right, first row, sitting: E.B. Davis, N.P. Johnson, O.D. Posey, M.I. Lowe, T.Y. Washington, E. McDonald. First row, standing: J.H. Reed, F.C. Pollard, I.J. Houston, L.D. Thompson, I.J. Hawkins, L. Peterson, W.W. Wingfield, J.H. Stanard.  Second row, standing: N.L. Brooks, C.B. Young, E.S. Liggins, R.H .Taylor, S.R. Tucker, J.L. McDew, L.C. Smith, J.J. Chick.  Absent, not in picture: M.R. Turner, G.B. Holmes, E.H. Leftwich."Standing on far right is Mr. Harvey, an insurance agent, Odiell Posey Bennett is the second from the left in front row, and Lillian Davis Tompson is standing in the middle of the second row wearing a light colored dress.
TitMainTitle: North Carolina Mutual Life Insurance Company employees, first row from left: E. B. Davis, N. P. Johnson, Odiell D. Posey, M. I. Lowe, T. Y. Washington, E. McDonald; second row: J. H. Reed, F. C. Pollard, I. J. Houston,  Lillian Davis Thompson, I. J. Hawkins, L. Peterson, W. W. Wingfield, J. H. Stanard; third row: N. L. Brooks, C. B. Young, E. S. Liggins, R. H .Taylor, S. R. Tucker, J. L. McDew, L. C. Smith, and J. J. Chick Thompson, posed outside of office, 2018 Centre Avenue, Hill District
